definition: content/calm/still/quiet/safe/secure/in good health/to find a place for/to install/to fix/to fit/to bring (a charge against sb)/to pacify/to harbor (good intentions)/security/safety/peace/ampere

sentences.english: The Anyway company advertised a new product in the newspaper .
sentences.chinese: 安利公司在報紙上爲一種新產品做廣告。

sentences.english: Amway is an illegal pyramid scheme.
Use Amway's cooker make dishes not only delicious but also healthy.
sentences.chinese: 安利皇后牌不鏽鋼鍋煮出來的食物不僅美味而且健康。

sentences.english: I started the Amway business with the encouragement of my family.
sentences.chinese: 在家人的鼓勵下，我開始了我的安利事業。

sentences.english: Teachers are a mixture of army training sergeants and Amway salesmen.
sentences.chinese: 老師就是軍隊訓練官和安利銷售人的結合體。

sentences.english: Distributors?listings include their occupations at the time they joined Amway.
sentences.chinese: 上述直銷商之職業均爲加入安利時的工作。

sentences.english: After all, working together is what this business is all about.
sentences.chinese: 歸根結柢，協力同心，是安利事業的經營之道。

sentences.english: You set a goal of attaining the highest pin qualification as soon as you started Amway business. Why?
sentences.chinese: 爲甚麼你一開始參加安利便訂下最高獎銜的目標？

sentences.english: In 1995, the An Li4 company walked into a Chinese market.
sentences.chinese: 1995年，安利公司走進了中國市場。

sentences.english: I joined Amway after noticing how using Nutrilite products had improved my health.
sentences.chinese: 加入安利是因爲健爾力產品改善了我的健康。

sentences.english: On my 18th birthday I was given the best present ever – an Amway Distributorship!
sentences.chinese: 而成爲安利直銷商，便是我十八歲的生日禮物。

sentences.english: Had Amway stollen your high-pressure pot from your home?
sentences.chinese: 難道安利投了你家的高壓鍋？

definition: (Internet slang) to recommend a product to sb
editor or creator of online content (diminutive term, often used to refer to oneself: I, me, this writer)
to return to the topic (idiom)/to get back to the main point
popular science/popularization of science/abbr. of 科學普及|科学普及
(Internet slang for 然而[ran2 er2]) however
(onom.) sound of singing, cheering etc/(phonetic)/(dialect) to chat
sentence-final particle, contraction of 了啊, indicating exclamation/particle placed after each item in a list of examples
darlings/fans/followers/short form of 親愛的們|亲爱的们
(slang) to cheer sb on/to show one's support/("call" is pronounced approximately like English "call")
(slang) Japan (loanword from the Japanese word for Japan, "Nihon")
